name: BC Big Bud
description: A cousin to the indica-dominant Big Bud cannabis strain from Amsterdam, BC Big Bud is a mostly sativa hybrid with potent cerebral effects. This fruity, citrus-smelling strain hailing from British Columbia delivers a balanced combination of indica and sativa sensations as well as relief to pain and nausea. As its name suggests, BC Big Bud plants produce colossal harvests after its 8 to 9 week flowering period that have both growers and consumers swooning.

articles.title: 6 New Strains Added to the Leafly Explorer
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
The Leafly Explorer is currently sitting at over 600 entries and growing. We often add new strains and products to the Explorer, ensuring that our visitors continue to receive the most up-to-date information about popular strains and products that interest them. Here's a rundown of six cannabis strains we added recently. If you've tried any of them, leave a review on their strain details pages! 
1. Erez
Erez, a best-selling cannabis variety in Israel, is an indica-dominant strain developed by the company Tikun Olam.
Characteristics: 

70% indica
Treats sleep disorders, nausea, inflammation, indigestion, and pain

2. Flowerbomb Kush
Flowerbomb Kush by Green House Seeds is an indica-dominant hybrid bred by crossing Green Crack and OG Kush.
Characteristics:

70% indica
Invigorating cerebral effects
Fast-acting and long-lasting
Creative
Stimulates appetite
Earthy, pine, citrus, and spice aroma
A 2nd place winner of the Amsterdam Cannabis Cup

3. XXX 420
XXX 420 from Ontario, Canada is an indica cross between Sweet Tooth #3 and Chemo.
Characteristics:

Euphoric
Full-body relaxation
Took 5th place in the 2004 Cannabis Cup

4. Strawberry
Originally bred in the Netherlands, Strawberry is a mostly sativa cannabis strain with a pungent fruity scent and uplifting effects.
Characteristics:

Stress-relieving
Relaxing and comfortable
Fruity, berry aroma
Flowering time of 9 weeks

5. Jean Guy
Jean Guy is a sativa-dominant strain from Canada with intensely cerebral effects and a sour citrus smell.
Characteristics:

High THC content
Energizing and uplifting
Citrus, lime, and pine aroma
May treat fibromyalgia symptoms

6. BC Big Bud
A cousin to the indica-dominant Big Bud cannabis strain from Amsterdam, BC Big Bud is a mostly sativa hybrid with potent cerebral effects.

Popular strain in Canada
Balanced indica and sativa genetics
Fruity, citrus aroma
May treat pain and nausea
Large harvests
8-9 week flowering period
